title: Pbe Account Disabled
body: I had an account from 2013, pretty old that i made in PBE, my login in pbe was iv4d. Is it possible to get it back, it currently says its disabled. I would really love to play around new patches before they hit live.

replies.body: If you're able to shoot us a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and verify your live account that is attached to that PBE account, we should be able to reactivate that for you.
